Container.Name: audacity
Container.Overview: Audacity(https://www.audacityteam.org/) is an easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder. Developed by a group of volunteers as open source.
Container.Requires: This image is unprotected by default __**do not**__ expose it to the internet. Please read https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-audacity#security for more information.
